title: How I Converted Profilo to Docusaurus in Under 2 Hours
description: “Joel and I were discussing having a website and how it would have been great to launch with it. So I challenged myself to add Docusaurus support. It took just over an hour and a half. I'm going to send you a PR with the addition so you can take a look and see if you like it. Your workflow for adding docs wouldn't be much different from editing those Markdown files.”

frontMatter.title: How I Converted Profilo to Docusaurus in Under 2 Hours
frontMatter.author: Christine Abernathy
